= Graphing =

Google's charting tool API will be used to provide any visual graphs, with the primary focus being the Jump/Kill history of a system.

[https://developers.google.com/chart/interactive/docs/index Google Charts]

== Features ==

Previous features that will be continued:
  * Mouse hover for detailed plot data
  * Toggling of data
  * Multiple options for data span (24/48/Week?)

Additional features
  * Update interval based on API updates
  * AJAX loading of data - instead of front loading
    * Both attainable via [https://developers.google.com/chart/interactive/docs/reference#google.visualization.drawchart .drawChart()] method (dataSourceUrl/refreshInterval)
